org.pojomatic
Class Pojomatic

java.lang.Object
  org.pojomatic.Pojomatic

public class Pojomatic
extends java.lang.Object

Static convenience methods for working with Pojomators. This class is carefull to create only a single Pojomator per pojo class. The overhead for looking up the Pojomator by pojo class is light, so a a typical use in a pojo class would be

  @Override public int hashCode() {
    return Pojomator.hashCode(this);
  }

  @Override public boolean equals(Object other) {
    return Pojomator.equals(this, other);
  }

  @Override public String toString() {
    return Pojomator.toString(this);
  }

See Also:
Pojomator

pojomator

public static <T> Pojomator<T> pojomator(java.lang.Class<T> pojoClass)
Get the Pojomator for pojoClass. The same instance will be returned every time for a given value of pojoClass.

Type Parameters:
T - the type represented by pojoClass
Parameters:
pojoClass - the class to create a Pojomator for.
Returns:
a Pojomator<T>
